experiment_name: Emergence of a catalytic tetrad during evolution of a highly active artificial aldolase
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:29 °C;    reaction_ph:7.5;    reaction_other_conditions:Compartmentalized in 20 pL surfactant-stabilized droplets dispersed in inert fluorinated oil;     Lysis agents (1 mg/mL lysozyme, 2 mg/mL polymyxin B, 10 mM EDTA, 5 mM EGTA) present;     Incubation time varied from 5 minutes to 1 hour;     2.7% acetonitrile;    reaction_substrate_concentration:nan
